error.message: Call to deprecated function drupal_get_profile(). Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use the install_profile container parameter or \Drupal::installProfile() instead. If you are accessing the value before it is written to configuration during the installer use the $install_state global. If you need to access the value before container is available you can use BootstrapConfigStorageFactory to load the value directly from configuration.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to hammerjs.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
